name: typescript-nameof-plugin
description: A VSCode-Extension for validating `nameof` calls using `@typescript-nameof`
author: Manuel Thalmann <m@nuth.ch>

scripts.vscode:prepublish: copyfiles ../../{CHANGELOG.md,LICENSE} -u 2 . && npm run --prefix ../.. build && npm run load-dependencies
scripts.vscode:postpublish: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm run restore-root
scripts.load-dependencies: npm run unlink-root && npm run init-dependencies

markdownDescription: A VSCode-Extension for validating `nameof` calls using `@typescript-nameof`
